actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archaeopteryx makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The archaeopteryx doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
